definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Chen's three sisters and his niece came for the ceremony from Huitong county in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 陈聚志的三个姐姐和侄女特意从湖南会同县赶来。

sentences.english: The shopkeeper was deeply moved. He cooked the dish elaborately for him and specially made it into the shape of horse bell.
sentences.chinese: 店主深为感动，为他精心烹制，并特意做成马铃形状。

sentences.english: Cheerful expression goatherd lifelike, seem to be specially to welcome us.
sentences.chinese: 牧童欢快的表情栩栩如生，好象是特意来欢迎我们的。

sentences.english: I guess the ower of the call must order the song .
sentences.chinese: 当然可以猜到电话那边的主人一定是特意定购。

sentences.english: Every spring my wife and I would come here just to see the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 每年春天我和我的妻子都会特意到这儿来赏花。

sentences.english: He had purposefully sat as far to the left on the passenger seat as possible.
sentences.chinese: 他特意坐在了副驾驶位尽量靠左边的地方。

sentences.english: We made a point of thanking the host before we left.
sentences.chinese: 我们离开前特意向主人道了谢。

sentences.english: We watched the little boy toddle up purposefully to the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 我们看著那小男孩特意晃到冰箱前。

sentences.english: I also use intensively a seeing pin to add multiple small holes.
sentences.chinese: 我也特意使用锥子在枪身上钻一些小洞。

sentences.english: We go out of our way to be here just for cheering for the Chinese table tennis team.
sentences.chinese: 我们特意赶到这儿是为给中国乒乓球队助威。

sentences.english: Jennifer knew what a difficult time I was having, and went out of her way to be friendly.
sentences.chinese: 詹尼弗明白我当时处境艰难，就特意地表现友好。

sentences.english: Brazil coach Denga has highlighted the Netherlands' rapid counter-attacks.
sentences.chinese: 巴西主帅邓加特意强调了荷兰快速反击的打法。

sentences.english: Ubiquitylation has emerged as an important regulator of cell-cycle-specific repair.
sentences.chinese: 泛素化已成为细胞周期特意修复的重要调节因子。

sentences.english: She made a cheongsam especially for this performance that fits her very well.
sentences.chinese: 为了这次演出，她特意定做了一身可体的旗袍。

sentences.english: Appelbaum also said she believes the filing was timed to Mr. Geithner's visit to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 她还认为，中国企业特意选在盖特纳访华时提起诉讼。

definition: for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
